title: geth1.12.0 BAD BLOCK？
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.12.0
CL client & version: prysm@v4.0.6
OS & Version: Ubuntu 18.04

The following information appears in the log，What do I need to do, or ignore?
```
ERROR[08-08|18:59:01.020] "\n########## BAD BLOCK #########\nBlock: 17872139 (0x8f04535cbdf991299ac40c669ac7fcd3961f41eadc2e502b2caf9ceba3b2aa72)\nError: invalid gas limit: have 30000000, want 29970705 +-= 29267\nPlatform: geth (devel) go1.20.3 amd64 linux\nVCS: e501b3b0-\nChain config: &params.ChainConfig{ChainID:1, HomesteadBlock:1150000, DAOForkBlock:1920000, DAOForkSupport:true, EIP150Block:2463000, EIP155Block:2675000, EIP158Block:2675000, ByzantiumBlock:4370000, ConstantinopleBlock:7280000, PetersburgBlock:7280000, IstanbulBlock:9069000, MuirGlacierBlock:9200000, BerlinBlock:12244000, LondonBlock:12965000, ArrowGlacierBlock:13773000, GrayGlacierBlock:15050000, MergeNetsplitBlock:<nil>, ShanghaiTime:(*uint64)(0xc0000441b0), CancunTime:(*uint64)(nil), PragueTime:(*uint64)(nil), TerminalTotalDifficulty:58750000000000000000000, TerminalTotalDifficultyPassed:true, Ethash:(*params.EthashConfig)(0x2f7ada0), Clique:(*params.CliqueConfig)(nil)}\nReceipts: \n##############################\n"
```

Your node contains a few bad(invalid) blocks:

e.g 

18156158, according to etherscan, the hash should be [0x7c2ddc6af44e13b07eaa86e24431613fee09093e1cf1ead7ca96b8b60d0dbf65](https://etherscan.io/block/18156158)

17997186, according to etherscan, the hash should be [0xc4dc04af37d92fa76fac9b5dd764e8bff572c05af9d425c347c0cc8fb77f3cd5](https://etherscan.io/block/17997186)

17902763, according to etherscan, the hash should be [0xd01f1a8c002242e506129c8b34c0e842913467946bdb250722b4b0006ce7fa3b](https://etherscan.io/block/17902763)


You are receiving a batch of non-canonical(potentially total invalid) blocks. Are you sure it's ethereum mainnet? ( at least according to the chain config printed, it's mainnet).
